title: Sloth
description: One of the seven is dead, and everyone's Adam 's done. With love, with school...with everything. Done.Beth 's doing her best to act "normal," but even Reed recognizes devastation, since all he does is fantasize about Kaia .Miranda 's lost too.Did she ever really forgive Harper ?Only Kane is actually doing uncovering how the crash happened -- and why.But there's no do-over with death.There's only moving on -- to the most unlikely places....
author: Robin Wasserman
